documents.document: @mike_mooney_ @JamiePower79 👏🏽 so good 😂
RT @JamiePower79: Hi @sweetpmac could you retweet for me please,it’s for a great charity!!🙏 https://t.co/W0RMVhN2OA
I believe her.
@philthrill69 I was obsessed with Sophie Simpson. Sophie, David and Tamara forever 💕
Sophie off Home and Away circa 1990 is now in Neighbours. And Jason Grimshaw is having a fight with Paul Robinson. Aussie soaps are the best.
@KavanaghJen Well jel! Looove NYC! Have a brilliant time!
@MissyMoeCahill Dermot was so nice at the end, singing their praises because he’s a gent. I’d say he drove away like: https://t.co/w8UPL3guXE
@MissyMoeCahill Most of it was lovely... even though she was dead set against open-plan. And she got her way with a CHINA CABINET which was hideous! 😷
@MissyMoeCahill Basically, a couple hired Dermot Bannon to redesign their home and the wife was mean to Our Dermot. She’d have argued with the wall I’d say 🙄
Catching up on #RoomToImprove and be the hokey, tis tough to watch 🤨
@vickinotaro Hahahaha! You win Vicki 😂👏🏽
Good morning 👋🏼 I’m back on #EarlyBreakfast and all the clocks say it’s 4am BUT IT ISN’T.
@walshant1 Thank you! Yes, I’ll talk to you at 5 ☺️
@mabaker_moz Again, I’d let a roar out of me, no problem 😂

@mabaker_moz It actually should be a hanging offence 😂 I live by the beach and everyone has a dog. I can categorically state that more people don’t pick up after their dogs than do. I see it every day... and have no problem calling it out 😜 (been told to F off plenty of times)
@emmabear88 I follow a slow cooker recipe page too and you should see the state of some of the dishes people post... with pride 😂
Community Facebook pages should just be renamed Lost Dog pages. That’s all, bye.
@dermot_smith @TodayFM @niveauk I'm actually not back til Monday! But you can still win a hamper 😁
@NiamhMcDisco And pants, in some cases 👵🏽
@NiamhMcDisco They wear Deep Heat to keep warm. Not even joking!
@orourkeenda Wonderful! Massive congrats and I love the name! Welcome home Baby Léa! 💕💕

I've been walking around all morning with a newspaper-ink-ronnie. I have talked to so many people who were probably too polite to say, in case it's a side effect of pregnancy 👨🏾

I imagine the same way you accidentally cut your fringe too short. I'll just even up this side... oh no, now it's lopsided, better go again... all of a sudden you're Worzel Gummidge. https://t.co/UwrBYX9jwP
